section.p: Determines the amount of fluid in milliliters reinfused during the procedure.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] amount with data type Physical Quantity
This is the amount of fluid in milliliters that was reinfused into the patient during this procedure.

Contains exactly one [1..1] amount with data type Physical Quantity
This is the amount of fluid in milliliters that was reinfused into the patient during this procedure.
